label: bow
body: Stretches entire front body, Mobilizes spine
organs: Tones abdominal and reproductive organs, massages heart
cues: Push the feet into the hands. Bring the chest forward. Relax your neck. Go gently.

label: camel
cues: Imagine your thighs and pelvis glued to a wall in front of you. Keep pressing your hips forward. Sit on your toes to bring your heels up a bit. Rest for a bit once coming out.

label: candle
cues: Come with your legs over and behind your head to come in and out of this pose. Flex your feet, like you're standing on the ceiling.

label: chair
cues: Tilt your pelvis forward. Press through your heels. Bring your arms a bit wider. Imagine actually going to sit down on a chair.
bodyPart: Chest, Glutes & Hip Flexors, Hamstrings, Quadriceps

label: cobra
body: Increases spinal flexibility, Strenghten lower back
cues: Keep looking down so the neck is in line with the spine. Bring your chest forward. Try lift your hands.
bodyPart: Lower Back, Middle Back, Spine, Upper Back & Lower Traps

label: corpse
organs: Lowers blood pressure, releases lactic acid buildup
mind: Relieves stress and fatigue, refreshes mind
cues: Bring your palms up and your legs a little out. Then just chill, you did good.

label: downward-dog
organs: Improves digestion, brings fresh blood to brain
cues: Spread your fingers fully out. Micro-bend your knees. Imagine brigning your chest to your thighs.

label: forward-fold
body: Stretches low back, back body & spine
organs: Stimulates the liver & kidneys, Massages abdominal organs
cues: Press through your heels. Point your sitting bones upward. Bend the knees. Straighten on an inhale, deepen on the exhale.
bodyPart: Hamstrings, Lower Back, Spine, Middle Back

label: half-lift
mind: Soothes mind when linked with breath
cues: Make your back flat, like a table. Look down so your neck is in line with the spine.

label: high-plank
cues: Suck your front body into the back of your body. Press into your hands and arms. Keep your whole body in one straight line.
followUp: Low Plank, Downward Dog, or Side Plank

label: low-plank
cues: Keep your elbows close to your body. Look down at the mat.

label: tree
cues: Tuck your chin in. Press through your heels. Turn your knee outward. Press your foot into the leg & leg into the foot.

label: triangle
body: Strengthens thighs; stretches legs, hips and shoulders
cues: Imagine someone pulling your right arm up. Press into the outer enge of your back leg. Look up at the sky past your right arm.
bodyPart: Glutes & Hip Flexors, Hamstrings, Shoulders, Spine

label: upward-dog
body: Strengthens spine and arms, stretches torso
cues: Keep your feet flat on the mat. Relax your glutes. Press through your hands and all fingertops.

label: upward-salute
cues: Look up at the thumbs. Bend back a little.

label: warrior-i
body: Strengthens arms and back, stretches hip flexors
cues: Press into the outside of the back foot. Dial in the toes a little. Roll your shoulders back and down.
bodyPart: Glutes & Hip Flexors, Hamstrings, Middle Back, Quadriceps

label: warrior-ii
body: Strengthens legs and arms, stretches groins and chest
cues: Keep the front knee bent. Gaze at the front hand. Pull your pinkies back. Image being stuck between two walls.
bodyPart: Glutes & Hip Flexors, Quadriceps, Upper Back & Lower Traps

label: wheel
body: Stretches spine and chest, strengthens legs and arms
organs: Stimulates respiratory, digestive, and cardiovascular systems
cues: Press through your heels. Let your neck fall down. Push your pelvis up toward the sky. Open the chest.

label: wide-legged-forward-fold
body: Strengthens legs and spine, stretches groin
cues: Point your sit bones up to the sky. Press into the outsides of your foot. Micro-bend the knees. Breathe deeply.
